Alternatively, if you're looking for a comedy-horror mix, "Scary Movie" might be up your alley. It's filled with humor and features an all-star cast including Anna Faris, Carmen Electra, and Wayans brothers. Enjoy the thrills!

Starring Johanna Wokalek and Moritz Bleibtreu, it provides a fascinating insight into this notorious organization.

Alternatively, "Hitch" offers an intriguing look at one of the most famous encounters in cinema history between Alfred Hitchcock and François Truffaut. With an impressive cast including Will Smith and Eva Mendes, it's a must-see for any film enthusiast.
